author: trimetilo
content:
Thanks! That was useful. However there are still some issues somewhere in my setup.

geth peercount doesn't seem to go above 0 and shows `Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain!` 

while prysm seems to be slowly syncing but shows `level=error msg="Could not connect to execution client endpoint" error="wanted chain ID 4844001004, got 1: wanted chain ID 4844001004, got 1" prefix=powchain` from time to time.

This is the repo I am working on: https://github.com/PabloCastellano/devnet-v4

author: jimmygchen
content: <@675104584481374226> it looks like geth is not detecting the genesis file initialised from `4844-testnet`, as it's showing `chain ID = 1`. Adding `--datadir /data` to your geth args should fix this.
